actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the feasibility of providing adequate upstream and downstream passage for fish at the Chiloquin Dam on the Sprague River, Oregon.
short_title: Chiloquin Dam Fish Passage Feasibility Study Act of 2001

summary.text: Chiloquin Dam Fish Passage Feasibility Study Act of 2001 - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to Congress on the feasibility of providing adequate upstream and downstream passage for fish at the Chiloquin Dam on the Sprague River, Oregon.

titles.title: Chiloquin Dam Fish Passage Feasibility Study Act of 2001

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the feasibility of providing adequate upstream and downstream passage for fish at the Chiloquin Dam on the Sprague River, Oregon.
